body.name: Techwood ES-3203 Hot Plate Electric Double Burner 1800W for Cooking with Adjustable Temperature & Stay Cool Handles, Black Stainless Steel, Compatible for All Cookwares
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 1 hr 58 mins
features: [🍳 2 RING HOB & VARIABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROL] - Techwood cast-iron hot plate heats efficiently with 2 thermostatically controlled heat settings conveniently to cook a variety of foods such as warm sauces, scrambled eggs, grilled cheese, soup, pasta, vegetables and so much more. Also you can use it as extra burner to keep food warm.

[🍳 ALL TYPES OF COOKWARE] - Techwood electric stove can be used with any type of cookware in your home, such as aluminium pans, copper pans, cast lron frying pans and non-magnetic stainless steel pans can heats cookware efficiently with minimal heat loss. And compatible with pots and pans with maximum size of 7.5 inches. And stainless steel body to withstand frequent use. Simply wipe with a clean cloth when cool.

[🍳 MULTIPURPOSE & PORTABLE] - The ultimate must-have kitchen accessory, Techwood countertop burner used compact and flat design makes it perfect for dorms, studios, RV/caravans, work, camping, everyday use or as an extra cooking appliance in the busy kitchen. Because of its small and light size, you can easily to used in confined spaces or anywhere.

[🍳 POWERFUL & SAFE] - Powered by 1800W, it heats up food faster than conventional cooking ranges. Modern brushed stainless steel housing. Non-slip feet for stable cooking. Solid stainless steel riveted handle stays cool and comfortable during cooking. Ergonomic design ensuring safe transport and stays cool on the stovetop. Built-in over-heat protection. Also, compared to induction cookers, electric cooktop is safe to use and doesn’t emit harmful radiation.

[🍳 PROMISE] - Techwood offers an excellent fan-favorite 18-month promise and friendly customer service, our customer service will be online all the time to help you. All Techwood products are protected by US Product Liability Insurance. See the instruction manual for details.
body.description: EASY COOKING & DON'T WORRY EASY COOKING Techwood hot plate is powerful to use as an additional solid burner to warm sauces, boil water, cook pasta, make soups, and vegetables and do so much more, just as if it were a normal stove. DON'T WORRY Techwood hot plates can be used with all types of cookware, which is more efficient and heats the cooking food to make the food more delicious.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Techwood portable cooktop provides cooking flexibility to your kitchen.It is extremely suitable for the moment that when you need an extra burner or microwave, or as a substitute kitchen stove to entertain a large group. Harmless infrared heat, cool to touch handles and portable design works great or college students in dorms, young adults living on their own, people with small spaces or RV’s/caravans, adventure-seekers, road-trippers, campers, and anti-microwave folks.

PRODUCT FEATURES Double burner 120V, 1300W + 500W of power.Heating fast, the principle of electric heating with Cast iron material makes heating faster.Adjustable thermostatsNon-slip rubber feet ensure that the hot pate stays firmly in place for safe use.

INDISPENSABLE ASSISTANT IN YOUR KITCHEN Cooking with this portable electric cooktop, prepare a meal for yourself to healing homesick.Even though in office, it is powerful enough to finish a meal quickly and compact enough to entertain a group.All of these troubles are a piece of cake for our Techwood countertop burner. HARMLESS & PROTABLE DESIGN Works great for college students in dorms, small spaces or RV’s/caravans, adventure-seekers, road-trippers, campers, and anti-microwave folks.Simply turn the control knob to the desired position, it will maintain the steady temperature for your cuisine until the setting is changed.It is used to care about over heat and avoid potential hazard. HEATING FAST WITH CAST IRON & EASY TO CLEAN Thread circulation heating on cast iron hot plate, which is good for heat preservationBlack cast iron design makes cleaning easier.To clean, simply wipe the machine with a clean and damp cloth when cool.

EASY COOKING & DON'T WORRY EASY COOKING Techwood hot plate is powerful to use as an additional solid burner to warm sauces, boil water, cook pasta, make soups, and vegetables and do so much more, just as if it were a normal stove. DON'T WORRY Techwood hot plates can be used with all types of cookware, which is more efficient and heats the cooking food to make the food more delicious. ATTN : preheating before heating, will make heating faster Never use harsh abrasive or steel wool pads to clean. Never immerse any part of the burner in water. In the first time of use the machine will give off a smell of smoke for the protective coating.

ATTENTION: The hot plate has a overheating protection and thermostat, it will automatically power off when the temperature is too high. It's a normal phenomenon. Please follow the instructions to use is no problem.The temperature ranges from 392F to 1162F and it will take about 10-15 minutes for a four-quart pot of water. Please cover the pot lid when boiling water.It takes about 20 minutes for the burner to cool completely, which helps keep the food warm for a long time.Please don't touch the body of the burner during use, beacuse the surface of the burner is made of stainless steel, which will cause heat conduction.Never use harsh abrasives, steel wool pads or caustic cleansers on any part of the hot plate as they may scratch the surface or damage the unit.When turn on for the first time, the appliance may give off vapours for up to 15 minutes. This is due to the protective substances on the heating elements. There is no need for concern and the vapours will dissipate with use.To make the burner work quickly: 1. Preheat before use; 2. Use a pan to cook as much as possible; 3. Use a lid when cooking. Since the hot plate emits heat when in use, please place it on a high temperature resistant surface!

ATTENTION: The hot plate has a overheating protection and thermostat, it will automatically power off when the temperature is too high. It's a normal phenomenon. Please follow the instructions to use is no problem.The temperature ranges from 392F to 1162F and it will take about 10-15 minutes for a four-quart pot of water. Please cover the pot lid when boiling water.It takes about 20 minutes for the burner to cool completely, which helps keep the food warm for a long time.Please don't touch the body of the burner during use, beacuse the surface of the burner is made of stainless steel, which will cause heat conduction.Never use harsh abrasives, steel wool pads or caustic cleansers on any part of the hot plate as they may scratch the surface or damage the unit.When turn on for the first time, the appliance may give off vapours for up to 15 minutes. This is due to the protective substances on the heating elements. There is no need for concern and the vapours will dissipate with use.To make the burner work quickly: 1. Preheat before use; 2. Use a pan to cook as much as possible; 3. Use a lid when cooking. Since the hot plate emits heat when in use, please place it on a high temperature resistant surface!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Takes a while to heat up and cool down but works great
reviews.reviewText: This is a handy hot plate. It is solid and the heat surface is flat so pots don't rock on like others than have a coil. It does take a while to heat up and cool down but works well when the temp is reached. It does take a little trial and error to figure out what the best temp is for heating foods.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great burner to use cast iron skillets on!! Love having it!!
reviews.reviewText: Works great, husband loves it and I don't have to worry about the cast iron scratching my new glass top stove. Bonus is that it is an extra burner for big meals like the holidays when we run out of stove room. Win Win!! Really works well and gets hot as we ever need it to!! Really a game changer for us!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good...
reviews.reviewText: I have used this burner set for a few days and I'm farely impressed. It seemed like a steal for the price.Top Pros:1. Very seemless and sleek build which makes for a ver easy cleanup. I like that I can just take my dish rag to the tough stuff. It feels and looks sturdy. It's also not very heavy, so very portable.2. It comes with a safety knob to set it to a shut off mode when not in use.3. It has a way sturdier cord than my last burner.4. I like how tall the legs are because it sets it up off of my counter more efficiantly for airflow in my opinion.5. Easy turning knob feature.6. It cooks really well, especially with pots and pans that match the 7inch burners. I use a 10inch cast iron skillet on it as well. It takes just a couple extra minutes for the heat to reach the edges, but it cooks evenly once it's up to temp. I suggest always preheating your pans. Especially if they are thicker cast iron.Top Cons:1. The knobs take nothing to turn them. So if you acidentally bump them without paying attention and you're safety shut off isn't activated, "them btchs be turnin on". So I suggests unplugging it when you aren't home especially, if you have crazy cats. LOL!2. I wish the cord was a few more feet long. It's not even 3 feet.3. There is no temperature indicator on the knobs or thermometer anywhere. So while it will cook your food, you never know what temperature it reaches. Although you can definitely figure out the sweet spots once you get a feel for it, I just think it would be helpful. It reminds me of a portable propaine camping stove, but electric.Suggestions:1. Use 7 inch or smaller pans for quicker boiling.2. Splash guard. As my burner set just sets on my counter, the grease gets everywhere. A splash guard isn't a have to, but would cut clean up time down.All in all, it is perfect for me and my partner. We have a small apartment with no kids so this thing proves worthy. I only hope it doesn't poop out after I upload this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product and excellent customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Arrived quickly but was damaged in the shipping. I contacted the company and they were amazingly helpful and had a new one on the way to me almost instantly. The second one arrived without the shippers crushing it, thankfully. It is very easy to use and easy to clean. Heats up fast and cooks well. The only thing I would point out is that if you are going to try and boil a large pot of water, it may take a while. A smaller pot boiled quickly, no problem, but I had a larger pan (that was probably too big to be using on the hotplate in the first place) and it took a long time to boil. Just fyi. I really love using it, and it is nice to be able to store up and out of the way once it has cooled.Unless you constantly boil huge pots of water, I would definitely recommend this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets hot fast, and slow to cool!
reviews.reviewText: Very nice hot plate. Watch your temp as it gets HOT quickly. Do not walk away from it, and be prepared to crank the heat down if needed. Once off it will retain the heat for some time, so again, watch it. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It works great frying meats and veggies. IT CAN NOT BOIL WATER... my pastas are horrible and it's just not getting hot enough to do a hard boil. It cuts the temperature down or off before it gets to boiling point. It trys but can't do it. 😔

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the function.
reviews.reviewText: It's pretty easy to use. It uses a regular power outlet. It get really hot so watch out when cooking. We bring it with us to hotel that has semi-kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped Working After 1 Year - Don't Buy
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed in this stove, would never buy again and I do NOT recommend it to anyone. I used this as the primary stove in my kitchenette, and it stopped working without any warning after owning it for just 14 months and using it about half of that time (warranty is 12 months). It's been sitting in the same spot on my counter since I set it up, and there was no damage done to the stove. I unplug it when it's not in use, so there was no chance of a power surge or electrical issue. I never really liked it (see more extensive pros and cons below), but while it was still working, it didn't seem worthwhile to write a negative review. I thought spending a little more money than similar stoves would get me a better product, and for $87, I expected a much longer lifespan.Pros:-slim profile-relatively easy to clean-heated up small items quicklyCons:-on/off markings and heat setting markings rubbed off within 4 months (only dish soap used for cleaning)-took a very long time to heat medium or large amounts of food or liquid (even when using pots that fit on the burner). Once took over 30 minutes to get two quarts of water up to a boil on "high" setting with the lid on-left burner and right burner do not heat up at the same rate - right burner was usually hotter-entire unit gets very hot when cooking (maybe all hotplates do this?)-inconsistent cooking times-stopped working after only 14 months
Heats up quickly, and works well. Stays fairly warm after turning off, so be careful about that.Overall very happy with this unit!
Duro nada mas un año con uso normal de cocina chica y merendar para 2 adultos. Nunca calentó bien las dos parrillas al mismo tiempo, pero si uno por uno.
Look great in mini kitchen. Gets really hot. Only negative comment is that the entire unit gets quite hot - not only the actual burners. However, this is better than it not getting hot enough.
